channel.title: Inter-Pk Development
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/Inter-PkLOGO-1.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/information-1.png[/img]
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Scroll Down for Updates![/font][/size]
[b]Heres a link to what I started with:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=443234.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=443234.0[/url]
I used Exion's 317 Project Insanity base for this project (credits to him.) In the beginning of this project I didn't have any large goal to achieve. Now, however, I am trying to complete summoning and impove the server/clients's all around performance and appearence. Heres a list of some qualities I have added/improved/going to improve:
Orange = working on Green = complete
[size=18pt]Large:[/size] -525 animations & graphics added -Nearly all summoning Npcs -40% of summoning pouches (adding more) -Summoning skill -Corporeal Beast -Tormented Demons -Bork (custom boss) (completed October 1st 2011)
[size=8pt]Minor:[/size] -Save Player Progress button -New npc models (besides summoning) -Easter ring -Point system -Proper bones on alter -Dragon claws with special -Few new items (korasi, primal) -Jagex mods secret item? -Pet shop -Summoning obelisks -Pickupstixx -Skillcapes with emotes -Summoning tab -Teletabs -Unpc/Pnpc -Cleaner commands -Summoning timer -Firemaking (didnt come with the source)
[u][b]Soon To Be Added:[/b][/u] -YOUR SUGGESTION HERE
*there are more and this will be updated
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/media-1.png[/img]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3qTQ5n3His]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3qTQ5n3His[/youtube]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_whipRun.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_torm.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_tele.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_tabs.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_summTab.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_summObel.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_summItems.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_summFam.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_SOL.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_skillcape.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_petShop.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_kbd.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_easterring.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_dungCape.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_claws.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_bork.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_bonesOnAlter.png[/img]
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ipk_blueDrags.png[/img]
[b]Update 1:[/b] Fully working Bork with unique drops [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ03wTlFpTg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ03wTlFpTg[/youtube]
[b]Update 2:[/b] Summoning Skill Training Base [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K7WekyVn8d4[/youtube]
[u]Has basic setup for the skill to progress. What needs editing:[/u] -Charms and tertiery items need to be incorperated into drops -The emote used when infusing pouches needs to be changed -The level up interface needs to be changed -Object gfx needs to be added [u]What will happen in the near future?[/u] -Summoning timer (already added, needs work) -Most summoning familiars coded to spawn on click of pouch -NpcVsNpc? -BoB (need help with that)
[img]http://i1107.photobucket.com/albums/h387/D_I_N_G__O/ainform-1.png[/img]
I bet you could probably find something like this so [b]you don't [/b] need to inform me that this has been done before! Please tell me what you think though & anything I should work on!

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:15, topic:416346”]Why don’t you just rewrite or write it from scratch, the WHOLE summoning shit. I could help you with BoB, if you need help, but the rest you need to learn to do it yourself :D!

Summoning on a 317 isn’t really good… but it’s unique, and looks much better than on a 317 loading higher gfx. change the fonts to a diff color instead of yellow… hurts my eyes…
Hope you go far though, and learn a lot.[/quote]

Thank you, and yes for the npcs to actually load they needed new anims/gfx. Also your help with BoB would be awsome, they rest I think I could do!

Read full topic

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Why don’t you just rewrite or write it from scratch, the WHOLE summoning shit. I could help you with BoB, if you need help, but the rest you need to learn to do it yourself :D!

Summoning on a 317 isn’t really good… but it’s unique, and looks much better than on a 317 loading higher gfx. change the fonts to a diff color instead of yellow… hurts my eyes…
Hope you go far though, and learn a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Yes, I suppose this could of some foundation for you. Good luck with the development, will check on this ever so often.

Means alot!

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K7WekyVn8d4[/youtube]

Has basic setup for the skill to progress. What needs editing:

-Charms and tertiery items need to be incorperated into drops
-The emote used when infusing pouches needs to be changed
-The level up interface needs to be changed
-Object gfx needs to be added

What will happen in the near future?

-Summoning timer (already added, needs work)
-Most summoning familiars coded to spawn on click of pouch
-NpcVsNpc?
-BoB (need help with that)

Read full topic

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yes, I suppose this could of some foundation for you. Good luck with the development, will check on this ever so often.

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“c o l d, post:10, topic:416346”][quote author=jitter link=topic=518273.msg3766299#msg3766299 date=1317259870]
hey i wouldso rep+ for this but i cant! i hope you dont quit dude! stick with it and be the best u can be!
[/quote]
Thanks man! I will do my best.

Only thing I liked is that fact you used the side window interface for the easter ring. Nice job there.

Thanks, suggest what I should do?[/quote]
I would switch over to a much more stable and reliable source, you’ll find with PI your code will be cluttered together into small areas. You can get your basics down here, but try for something like rs2dv or Hyperion one day, if you’re good enough they’ll come naturally. At the moment, I would try to understand the fundamentals.

Read full topic

item.title: Inter-Pk Development
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

[center][/center]

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Scroll Down for Updates![/font][/size]

Heres a link to what I started with: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=443234.0

I used Exion’s 317 Project Insanity base for this project (credits to him.) In the beginning of this project I didn’t have any large goal to achieve. Now, however, I am trying to complete summoning and impove the server/clients’s all around performance and appearence. Heres a list of some qualities I have added/improved/going to improve:

Orange = working on
Green = complete

[size=18pt]Large:[/size]
-525 animations & graphics added
-Nearly all summoning Npcs
-40% of summoning pouches (adding more)
-Summoning skill
-Corporeal Beast
-Tormented Demons
-Bork (custom boss) (completed October 1st 2011)

[size=8pt]Minor:[/size]
-Save Player Progress button
-New npc models (besides summoning)
-Easter ring
-Point system
-Proper bones on alter
-Dragon claws with special
-Few new items (korasi, primal)
-Jagex mods secret item?
-Pet shop
-Summoning obelisks
-Pickupstixx
-Skillcapes with emotes
-Summoning tab
-Teletabs
-Unpc/Pnpc
-Cleaner commands
-Summoning timer
-Firemaking (didnt come with the source)

Soon To Be Added:
-YOUR SUGGESTION HERE

*there are more and this will be updated

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3qTQ5n3His]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3qTQ5n3His[/youtube]

Update 1: Fully working Bork with unique drops
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ03wTlFpTg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NQ03wTlFpTg[/youtube]

Update 2: Summoning Skill Training Base
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K7WekyVn8d4[/youtube]

Has basic setup for the skill to progress. What needs editing:
-Charms and tertiery items need to be incorperated into drops
-The emote used when infusing pouches needs to be changed
-The level up interface needs to be changed
-Object gfx needs to be added
What will happen in the near future?
-Summoning timer (already added, needs work)
-Most summoning familiars coded to spawn on click of pouch
-NpcVsNpc?
-BoB (need help with that)

I bet you could probably find something like this so you don’t need to inform me that this has been done before! Please tell me what you think though & anything I should work on!

Read full topic
